txt.en: Hard Tack Event: Large Ore Delivery
Hard Tack at Thorin's Hall has ended
'Ow, what did you do that for?'
'I was walking here. Did you not see me?'
'Well that was embarrassing... for you!'
'Were you carrying ore? You should be more careful.'
'Of all the things to happen....'
'You really should pay more attention.'

'Freeing the ever-burning ore from nearby veins is only half the effort needed. Ever-burning ore is not only volatile but also heavy.

'You can possibly carry one large chunk of ever-burning ore. It will burn the longest, but it will also greatly weigh you down.

'Collect a large chunk of ore and deliver it to an ore-cart in Ukhbab-gairu.'
'Oh my... that is going to leave a mark.'
'Seriously...?'
'As if being underground all the time was not enough....'
A sluggard miner tripped you up
You delivered the ore to a mine-cart, get another task
Collect a large chunk of harvested ever-burning ore and deliver it to a mine-cart in the area of the Hard Tack of Thorin's Hall event.
You collected a large chunk of ever-burning ore and now need to deliver it to an ore cart to transfer the ore to the cookfires.
Deliver the large ore to a mine cart
Ever-burning ore is needed to keep the cook-fires of Thorin's Hall active. Collect a large chunk of ore and deliver it to an ore cart.
Deliver a large piece of ever-burning ore to a mine-cart
<rgb=#ff0000>Avoid the lazy prospectors</rgb>
Deliver the large chunk of ore to a mine cart
Carry the large piece of ever-burning ore to a mine-cart
'That is going right to my head. I need to lie down.'
'I think I need to lie down.'
Collect medium-sized chunks of ever-burning ore ([placeholder]/1)
'I did not realize this was a contact competition.'
'Was there something extra in this drink? Ugh.'
'Oh no. The cave is spinning.'
'This cannot be good. I need to rest.'
Deliver the large chunk of ever-burning ore to an ore cart
'That was a good nap.'
'Is this for me? Many thanks, friend.'
<rgb=#ff0000>Hard Tack at Thorin's Hall ends</rgb>
'How did you know I was thirsty?'
'This smell suspiciously wonderful!'
'I think you might be my new best friend.'
'Your kindness known no bounds.'
You dropped the ore
You collected ever-burning ore ([placeholder]/1)
